an10.68:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā naḷakapāne viharati palāsavane.
an10.68:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an10.68:1.3: Atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattiṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
an10.68:2.2: Paṭibhātu taṁ, sāriputta, bhikkhūnaṁ dhammī kathā.
an10.68:2.5: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.68:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappesi pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā.
an10.68:3.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.68:3.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an10.68:4.1: “Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.68:4.9: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:4.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena hāyati maṇḍalena hāyati ābhāya hāyati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:4.11: evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.68:4.19: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:5.1: Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī atthi …
an10.68:5.9: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihāni.
an10.68:5.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena vaḍḍhati ābhāya vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:5.11: evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu …pe…
an10.68:5.12: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihānī”ti.
an10.68:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā paccuṭṭhāya āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
an10.68:6.3: Yassa kassaci, sāriputta, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu hirī natthi …
an10.68:6.11: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:6.12: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena hāyati maṇḍalena hāyati ābhāya hāyati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:6.13: evamevaṁ kho, sāriputta, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu …pe…
an10.68:6.14: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:7.1: Yassa kassaci, sāriputta, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu hirī atthi …
an10.68:7.9: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihāni.
an10.68:7.10: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena vaḍḍhati ābhāya vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:7.11: evamevaṁ kho, sāriputta, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu …pe…
an10.68:7.12: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihānī”ti.
